name: Visuospatial
description:
Visuospatial uses gravity to give you multiple perspectives of objects in the games environment. The simulation (referred to as The Gravity Program) teaches and allows players to use gravity to navigate through the environment. Can you solve the physics and perspective based puzzles?

Download and play this early build of Visuospatial.

More content to come.

Ealry development build
